mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jianli_uuid_number as jianliUuidNumber ,a.jianli_name as jianliName ,a.jianli_xingming as jianliXingming ,a.jianli_types as jianliTypes ,a.jianli_xinzi as jianliXinzi ,a.jianli_xueli as jianliXueli ,a.jianli_jingli as jianliJingli ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.jianli_file as jianliFile ,a.jianli_phone as jianliPhone ,a.jianli_photo as jianliPhoto ,a.jianli_address as jianliAddress ,a.jiaoyu_text as jiaoyuText ,a.shixi_text as shixiText ,a.geren_text as gerenText ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM jianli a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.jianli_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliUuidNumber},'%')
and a.jianli_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliName},'%')
and a.jianli_xingming like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliXingming},'%')
and a.jianli_types = #{params.jianliTypes}
and a.jianli_xinzi like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliXinzi},'%')
and a.jianli_xueli like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliXueli},'%')
and a.jianli_jingli like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliJingli},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.jianli_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliPhone},'%')
and a.jianli_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.jianliAddress},'%')
and a.jiaoyu_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiaoyuText},'%')
and a.shixi_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.shixiText},'%')
and a.geren_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.gerenText},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yuanxi_id = #{params.yuanxiId}
and yonghu.banji_id = #{params.banjiId}
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
